title: Control Smart Outlets from Secure Lockscreen
content:
I have 4 of the exact same smart plugs linked to my Google Home app.


I can turn one of these On/Off with my phone locked by saying "Ok Google turn on/off the Christmas Lights", but when I try this for the other 3, the Google assistant says that I must first unlock my device to perform that action. I have tried clearing storage and re-setting-up the Google app and the Google Home app.

Why can I control one of the outlets from a secure lockscreen, but not the other 3?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3a
